name: Dancing Hair
description:
This is a lighthearted game, a new way to enjoy the music!
Become the tangled princess, avoid obstacles and finish the fashion runway. Get super long majestic hair to the rhythm of music.

At Dancing Hair, you can experience music of different styles and singers, and change your modeling with amazing and interesting choices!

【Easy to play】
- Swipe left and right
- Try to get more hair to get more rewards
- Be careful not to encounter obstacles

【Game Features】
- Simple game control experience
- Number of songs to satisfy different tastes

【Music Choices】
- Hot songs as: Dance Monkey/Despacito/How You Like That/Unity/Senorita.
- Super artists as: Ava Max/Lady Gaga/Post Malone/Billie Eilish/Justin Bieber.

Try it now! Music lovers will love it!

If any producer or record label has a problem with any of the music used in the game please email us and if necessary it will be removed immediately (including images used).

How to contact us:
Please send an email to contact@tinymaxgames.com
